title: GOP candidate Mike Huckabee makes racist tweet about Asians during Democratic debate
text:
Published By: Houston Chronicle - Today 
Mike Huckabee took a dive into racist stereotypes in an attempt to burn left-wing candidate Bernie Sanders. Huckabee wrote: "I trust @Bernie...
